name: payloadsallthethings-skills
description: Comprehensive security testing skills based on PayloadsAllTheThings - 61 vulnerability categories with payloads, techniques, and exploitation methods for authorized penetration testing and security assessments.
author: Security Skills Marketplace

skills.name: api-key-leaks
skills.description: Detect and validate leaked API keys, tokens, and credentials. Use when finding exposed secrets in code, logs, or repositories.

skills.name: account-takeover
skills.description: Account takeover techniques via password reset poisoning, OAuth flaws, and session manipulation. Use for auth testing.

skills.name: brute-force
skills.description: Brute force and rate limit bypass techniques for authentication testing. Use when testing login security.

skills.name: business-logic
skills.description: Business logic vulnerability testing - price manipulation, workflow bypass, privilege escalation. Use for logic flaw hunting.

skills.name: cors
skills.description: CORS misconfiguration exploitation - origin reflection, null origin, regex bypass. Use when testing cross-origin policies.

skills.name: crlf
skills.description: CRLF injection for header manipulation, response splitting, and session fixation. Use for HTTP header testing.

skills.name: csv-injection
skills.description: CSV/spreadsheet injection with formula payloads for Excel, Google Sheets. Use when testing export functionality.

skills.name: cve-exploits
skills.description: Common CVE exploitation techniques and known vulnerability payloads. Use for known vulnerability testing.

skills.name: clickjacking
skills.description: Clickjacking and UI redressing attacks with frame busting bypass. Use when testing X-Frame-Options.

skills.name: client-path-traversal
skills.description: Client-side path traversal techniques for browser-based file access. Use for client-side security testing.

skills.name: command-injection
skills.description: OS command injection with space bypass, filter evasion, blind detection. Use when testing system command execution.

skills.name: csrf
skills.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery exploitation with token bypass and SameSite cookie evasion. Use for CSRF testing.

skills.name: dns-rebinding
skills.description: DNS rebinding attacks for same-origin policy bypass. Use when testing internal service access.

skills.name: dom-clobbering
skills.description: DOM clobbering techniques for JavaScript variable overwriting via HTML injection. Use for DOM security testing.

skills.name: dos
skills.description: Denial of Service techniques - ReDoS, resource exhaustion, algorithmic complexity. Use for availability testing.

skills.name: dependency-confusion
skills.description: Dependency confusion and supply chain attacks via package managers. Use for supply chain security testing.

skills.name: path-traversal
skills.description: Directory/path traversal with encoding bypasses for file system access. Use when testing file operations.

skills.name: encoding
skills.description: Encoding transformation techniques - URL, Unicode, Base64 for filter bypass. Use for WAF evasion.

skills.name: external-variable
skills.description: External variable modification and parameter tampering techniques. Use for input validation testing.

skills.name: lfi-rfi
skills.description: Local/Remote File Inclusion with PHP wrappers, log poisoning, RCE techniques. Use for file inclusion testing.

skills.name: gwt
skills.description: Google Web Toolkit security testing and deserialization attacks. Use when testing GWT applications.

skills.name: graphql
skills.description: GraphQL injection, introspection abuse, batching attacks, and authorization bypass. Use for GraphQL API testing.

skills.name: hpp
skills.description: HTTP Parameter Pollution for server-side and client-side exploitation. Use when testing parameter handling.

skills.name: headless-browser
skills.description: Headless browser exploitation and Chrome DevTools Protocol attacks. Use for browser automation testing.

skills.name: hidden-params
skills.description: Hidden parameter discovery and exploitation techniques. Use for parameter fuzzing and enumeration.

skills.name: deserialization
skills.description: Insecure deserialization for Java, PHP, Python, .NET, Ruby with gadget chains. Use for serialization testing.

skills.name: idor
skills.description: Insecure Direct Object Reference exploitation for authorization bypass. Use when testing access controls.

skills.name: management-interface
skills.description: Insecure management interface exploitation - admin panels, debug endpoints. Use for admin access testing.

skills.name: randomness
skills.description: Insecure randomness exploitation - predictable tokens, weak seeds. Use when testing token generation.

skills.name: scm-exposure
skills.description: Source code management exposure - .git, .svn, .hg directory exploitation. Use for repository discovery.

skills.name: jwt
skills.description: JWT attacks - none algorithm, key confusion, brute force, header injection. Use for JWT security testing.

skills.name: java-rmi
skills.description: Java RMI exploitation and deserialization attacks. Use when testing Java RMI services.

skills.name: ldap
skills.description: LDAP injection for authentication bypass and data extraction. Use when testing LDAP integration.

skills.name: latex
skills.description: LaTeX injection for file read, command execution, and XSS. Use when testing LaTeX/PDF generation.

skills.name: mass-assignment
skills.description: Mass assignment exploitation for privilege escalation via ORM. Use when testing API parameter binding.

skills.name: nosql
skills.description: NoSQL injection for MongoDB, CouchDB with operator injection and auth bypass. Use for NoSQL database testing.

skills.name: oauth
skills.description: OAuth misconfiguration exploitation - redirect_uri, state bypass, token theft. Use for OAuth flow testing.

skills.name: orm-leak
skills.description: ORM leak exploitation for data exposure via object-relational mapping. Use when testing ORM implementations.

skills.name: open-redirect
skills.description: Open redirect bypass techniques for phishing and token theft. Use when testing redirect functionality.

skills.name: prompt-injection
skills.description: LLM prompt injection, jailbreaks, and AI security testing. Use when testing AI/LLM applications.

skills.name: prototype-pollution
skills.description: JavaScript prototype pollution for XSS and RCE in Node.js. Use for JavaScript security testing.

skills.name: race-condition
skills.description: Race condition exploitation with HTTP/2 single-packet attacks. Use for concurrency testing.

skills.name: regex
skills.description: Regular expression attacks - ReDoS, injection, bypass techniques. Use when testing regex validation.

skills.name: request-smuggling
skills.description: HTTP request smuggling - CL.TE, TE.CL, HTTP/2 desync attacks. Use for proxy/CDN testing.

skills.name: reverse-proxy
skills.description: Reverse proxy misconfiguration exploitation for access bypass. Use when testing proxy configurations.

skills.name: saml
skills.description: SAML injection and signature bypass for SSO exploitation. Use when testing SAML authentication.

skills.name: sqli
skills.description: SQL injection - Union, Error, Blind, Time-based for all major databases. Use for database security testing.

skills.name: ssi
skills.description: Server-Side Include injection and Edge Side Include attacks. Use when testing SSI-enabled servers.

skills.name: ssrf
skills.description: Server-Side Request Forgery with cloud metadata, protocol smuggling, bypass techniques. Use for SSRF testing.

skills.name: ssti
skills.description: Server-Side Template Injection for Jinja2, Twig, Freemarker, Velocity RCE. Use for template engine testing.

skills.name: tabnabbing
skills.description: Reverse tabnabbing exploitation via target=_blank links. Use when testing external link handling.

skills.name: type-juggling
skills.description: PHP type juggling and loose comparison bypass with magic hashes. Use for PHP security testing.

skills.name: file-upload
skills.description: File upload bypass - extension, content-type, magic bytes, polyglot files. Use for upload security testing.

skills.name: vhost
skills.description: Virtual host enumeration and Host header attacks. Use when testing virtual host configurations.

skills.name: web-cache
skills.description: Web cache deception and poisoning attacks. Use when testing CDN/cache behavior.

skills.name: websocket
skills.description: WebSocket security testing and cross-site WebSocket hijacking. Use for WebSocket testing.

skills.name: xpath
skills.description: XPath injection for authentication bypass and data extraction. Use when testing XML/XPath queries.

skills.name: xslt
skills.description: XSLT injection for file read, SSRF, and RCE. Use when testing XSLT transformations.

skills.name: xss
skills.description: Cross-Site Scripting - Reflected, Stored, DOM-based with filter bypass techniques. Use for XSS testing.

skills.name: xxe
skills.description: XML External Entity injection for file read, SSRF, and DoS. Use when testing XML parsing.

skills.name: zip-slip
skills.description: Zip Slip path traversal in archive extraction. Use when testing file upload/extraction.
